articles.title: Trump shows that impeachment will not moderate him
articles.description: (CNN)President Donald Trump is not waiting to be acquitted of impeachable crimes to show that no one can stop him doing what he wants to do.

articles.title: 'Staggering number' of human rights defenders killed in Colombia, the UN says
articles.description: (CNN)Human rights activists and community leaders in Colombia are being killed at an alarming rate, the United Nations human rights agency warned Tuesday as it urged the government to "make a strenuous effort" to prevent attacks on those who are defending fundamental rights.
